data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Donga, Benin.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Donga, Benin
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: the state of Donga has (about) 28,696 people who know Jesus, 92,590 people who know about him culturally, and 262,914 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord we pray you unite the 28,696 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Donga.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Over 68.43 percent of the people of Donga are far from Jesus.
Jesus, I pray that all the Anii people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Anii people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Anii people is yours.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Donga, Benin.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 28,696 believers in Donga and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Donga, Benin has a population of 384,200.

We estimate Donga has 28,696 people who might know Jesus, 92,590 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 262,914 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 28,696 believers in Donga, Benin a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Donga
location.people_groups_list: Ede Nago, Kura, Lama, Kambole, Ica, Lukpa
